t = input()
for _ in xrange(t):
    n = input()
    d = {}
    for i in xrange(n):
        s = raw_input()
        s1 = s[:len(s)-1]
        s2= s[len(s) -1]
        if s1 not in d:
            d[s1 ] = s2
        else :
            d[s1] =s2

    c = 0
    for i in d:
        if d[i] == '+':
            c+= 1
        else:
            c -= 1

    print c
